user_stories.content: As a nan, I want to nan so that nan
As a a user, I want to register an account  so that I can get an account, log in, and use all the functionalities on this website.
As a a user, I want to use email for verification so that I can have my account registered, and if there is anything wrong with my account, I can fix the problem using my email.
As a a user , I want to have a unique username so that I will not need to type in the email address when logging in because it is too long and not user-friendly.
As a a user, I want to use a nickname so that I don't want to use my real name because I want to protect my privacy.
As a a user, I want to not fill in my accurate information so that I will not reveal personal information
As a a user, I want to have a password so that other people can't get my account content information.
As a a user , I want to have my password confirmation (like repeat password when registering) so that I will not mistype my password and have to reset it
As a a user, I want to sign in with an existing account email and password so that I can log in with the email.
As a a user, I want to sign in with an existing account username and password so that I can log in with the username.
As a a user, I want to sign out  so that I can switch to another account / protect my privacy.
As a a user, I want to be able to sign out at any page after logging in so that I can 'log out' easily because this function is frequently used.
As a a user, I want to reset my password, authorised by my email. so that I can modify my password / find my password back in case I forgot.
As a a user, I want to have password confirmation when resetting the password so that I will not mistype my new password
As a a user , I want to delete my account so that I can protect my medicine purchase history and will not be able to access it by others.
As a a user's family member, I want to log in to the same account on different devices concurrently so that my family members could share information about the medicines.
As a a user , I want to be able to add multiple locations in my account so that I can manage medicines in different locations
As a a user , I want to be able to see the list of my locations so that I can manage the information about my added locations
As a a user , I want to be able to visit the 'My Locations' page at any page after logging in so that I can visit 'My Locations' easily because this page is frequently visited.
As a a user, I want to be able to delete location in my location list so that I can delete useless locations and save space.
As a a user, I want to be able to modify location detail in my location list so that I can change location details
As a a user, I want to access detailed information about my medicine clearly so that I can obtain detailed information about the medicine by clicking on the drug on the dashboard.
As a a user , I want to add new medicine into existing locations so that I could check later to avoid redundant purchasing.
As a a user, I want to be able to see the medicines in the location I selected  so that I can learn all the medications I have in a chosen location
As a a user , I want to be able to add medicines at any page after logging in so that I can visiadd medicines' easily because this function is frequently used.
As a a user, I want to upload the photo of the medicine so that I can see what the medicine looks like
As a a user , I want to delete the photo I have uploaded of the medicine so that I can change the images/delete the photos
As a a user, I want to delete medicine so that I can ensure the medicine that is finished or thrown out will not appear in my medicine list on the app.
As a a user, I want to be able to see 'frequently used' medicine  so that I can quickly find the medicines I've been using recently.
As a a user , I want to browse a list of all my medicines on the dashboard so that I can quickly scan all my medicines
As a a user , I want to see an overview of all medicines in the list on the dashboard so that I can quickly learn general information about my medicines
As a a user , I want to see photos of the medicines in the list on the dashboard so that I can identify medicines quickly
As a a user, I want to see the medicine is marked in red when the medicine quantity is less than or equal to 2 times of dosage so that I can be reminded when the medication runs out
As a a user , I want to see the medicine is marked in red when this medicine expires in 15 days so that I can be reminded when the medication is about to expire
As a a user, I want to take notes about my medicine so that I can record some additional information about this medicine
As a a user, I want to modify notes about my medicine (Not any information from FDA) so that I can modify the additional information about the medicine
As a a user, I want to reduce the remaining amount (quantity) of the medicine by taking medicine so that I can update my medicine inventory

As a a user, I want to search for a medicine (blurry search) so that I could search for the drug I'm looking for, even though I only remember a few letters of the drug., even I only remember few letters of the drug.
As a a user, I want to the search bar can auto-fill the information about the medicines so that I don't need to type too much
As a a user, I want to use 'filter' when searching so that I could search more conveniently and find the medicines whose names were entirely forgotten.
As a a user/ a visitor, I want to click 'About this Website' on the sidebar so that I can know the background of this website.
As a a developer/ a manager/ a pharmacist, I want to be able to modify wrong information about drugs so that I can make this website reliable.
As a client, I want to be able to delete some account so that I can free the places occupied by inactive accounts.
As a a user, I want to operate all the functions simple and convenient  so that I don't have trouble using the software.
As a a user , I want to see the project to be most in purple and blue so that I will be happy to use it as a medicine-related website.
As a the product owner, I want to put email verification codes in a cache and cannot send the code again within the 60s so that I can reduce pressure on the server and database
As a a user , I want to visit frequently used pages by sidebar so that I can easily and quickly access the page I need
As a a user , I want to see a 'loading' notice when the website is loading something so that I can have a better user experience
As a a user, I want to see a '404 Not Found' page if there is something wrong with the website so that I can know what is happening if there is problem
